thread.title: Mark Cuban teases Donald Trump again at NBA Celebrity All-Star Game | NBA | Sporting News
thread.title_full: Mark Cuban teases Donald Trump again at NBA Celebrity All-Star Game | NBA | Sporting News

author: Dan Sostek
title: Mark Cuban teases Donald Trump again at NBA Celebrity All-Star Game | NBA | Sporting News
text:
â€” Ohm Youngmisuk (@NotoriousOHM) February 17, 2017 
Ooooh, burn! Is Cuban implying that he wants to be the 46th president? We can only recklessly speculate that yes, that is exactly what he is probably insinuating. 
If Cuban were to earn a seat in the White House, which would have sounded ridiculous a couple years ago but now sounds like even money in Vegas, I'd hope his cabinet would be as fun as I imagine it'd be. 
Tyson Chandler would be the obvious choice for Secretary of Defense, while Dirk Nowitzki, with his German ties, would be a great candidate for Secretary of State. Rick Carlisle is smart and capable enough to fill any cabinet position. And of course, J.J. Barea would sneak his way in there, someway, somehow. Watch This
